about_the_game:
Old school vibes are abound in this intense action third person rogue like shooter with a twist.

  • Physics based action that requires players to avoid the vehicles thrown at you while using your own vehicles and those in the level to destroy your enemies.

  • Multiple weapons that could be from any old school boomer shooter, each one is useful and has a role to fill in helping achieve victory.

  • 3 Abilities to enhance which enhances the players movement and firepower.

  • State of the art graphics on a huge 16km^2 city island with a day night cycle.

  • Wide enemy variety and random spawning means that no two runs are the same.

  • See how far you can get by competing in each cup which has up to 15 laps of action, and try to get the best time on the leaderboards after reaching the goal!

  • See how far you can get by competing in each cup which has up to 15 laps of action, and try to get the best time on the leaderboards after reaching the goal!
name: Grand Throw Auto

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or 12 compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 13 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or 12 compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 13 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD

short_description: Launch a vehicle and make it have maximum impact! Grand Throw Auto is a fast paced action packed game with rogue like elements. Fight a battle for the cup victory. With many difficulty settings that you earn as you pass the previous tests, as well as various types of foes and weapons to collect.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Japanese*, Korean*, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Turkish*
*languages with full audio support
